title: Styling Gravity Forms
description: Learn how to customize the appearance of your forms with CSS and theme integration.

blocks.content: Make your forms match your website's design perfectly with custom styling. This guide covers everything from basic CSS tweaks to complete theme integration.

Essential CSS techniques for form styling:

  • Customizing input fields
  • Styling buttons and submit elements
  • Modifying field labels and descriptions
  • Creating responsive layouts

Seamlessly integrate forms with your theme:

  • Using theme color schemes
  • Matching typography
  • Responsive breakpoints
  • Custom form templates
